ygData.subject: Re: wanderlust ramblings
ygData.msgSnippet: Talian, You would be perfect in North Karana. Scythe Beetles and Borer Beetles are too slow to catch you, and you can simply run in circles bellowing that
ygData.messageBody:
Talian,

You would be perfect in North Karana. Scythe Beetles and Borer Beetles are
too slow to catch you, and you can simply run in circles bellowing that
boisterous voice of yours until they've had enough. I find the effect to be
much like Jythri, after several flagons of Kalish.

Also, though let it be whispered only amoung bards, you can manage a
Griffawn in much the same way. I highly recommend the ancient Combine Gates
in North Ro as a place to lay your gear whilst you hunt.

If you have a colder temperment, you should visit Everfrost. Nothing fills
me more than to fell a great Mammoth with my tunes.

Hope you find your greener pastures... I know the thirst for leaving the
desert runs deep in me.

Dendall, Ollave of the Aegis
http://www.soerbaird.com

-----Original Message-----
From: Joshua Owyang [mailto:owyanj01@...]
Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 11:55 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] wanderlust ramblings


From: Joshua Owyang <owyanj01@...>

This is a great discussion board... we've discussed
songs, effects, and bardic life...

but now, I wanna ask a few new general questions... What is there to hunt?
Where should I go?

I am a level 14 bard and have spent most of my life in
the Freeport-commonlands-Nro-oasis area... don't get
me wrong, there is some great hunting there and I have
made many friends... but I want adventure and
excitment ;) I've done some wandering on my own and
traveling, but I usually get really lost or reallydead... both not too
good.

I ask all wise bards from other areas to give me some
advice... what's out there? How do I get to those
areas that have cool stuff, like spiked collars and
bronze armor, etc... Anything cool out at Qeynos or
Halas? I've been to Kelethin and crushbone, but the
huntings kinda slim, and very crowded ;) Lately I've
been cutting down on my random adventures because I'm
too scared to die and lose my body in a place meant
for levels 40+ Where are these elementals to fight?
What's in the Lavastorm mountains? anything to hunt
near erudin? Where are the dragons? (even though I
probably wanna stay away from that) How do people
keep leveling up so high? All those beta people know
all the areas, I have no idea...

Forgive my ramblings, I just want to see the worldsemi-safely...

Talian
